price: 118. Kuwa heysta (diinta) Yuhuudiyadda Waxaanu ka xaaraamaynay waxyaalaha aan horay kuugu soo sheegnay28. mana aanu dulmin, iyagaase nafahooda dulmiyay.
arabic: وَعَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ حَرَّمۡنَا مَا قَصَصۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَٰهُمۡ وَلَٰكِن كَانُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِمُونَ
footnotes: 28. Waa waxa ku soo arooray Suuradda Al –Ancaam Aayadda 146

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waʿalā alladhīna hādū ḥarramnā mā qaṣaṣnā ʿalayka min qablu wamā ẓalamnāhum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūna
